paragraph.1: Since I was a child I have always been passionate about technology., I remember when i was 8 or 9 years old how I disassembled the electronic devices that no longer worked and used the parts for my 'experiments'. As I grew older I began develop the interest for computing and programming, creating my first page about videogames when I was 12 years old.
paragraph.2: I am lucky to be in love with my profession, which implies that I enjoy working and I am always looking for an innovate approach and the highest quality of the product created when proposing solutions.
paragraph.3: I graduated as a Software Engineer at the University of Malaga in 2022. I currently work as Software Developer, in the field of Web Development, both on the Frontend and Backend (Although there are people who do not like this concept, I consider myself FullStack Web Developer) with modern technologies like React and Node, but I also interested in Artificial Intelligence and Cibersecurity.

school.name: Al-Baytar High School
school.title: High School (2008 - 2016)
school.description: During my time in high school I especially enjoyed science subjects: mathematics, biology, physics and chemistry. In technology i wrote my first Java programs.

course.name: University of Malaga
course.title: Setup and Configuration of PC (2016)
course.description: Official university extension course in which I learned in depth the functionality and how the hardware components of a PC interact with each other and the best combinations of these.

university.name: University of Malaga
university.title: Software Engineering (2016 - 2022)
university.description: At university I learned all the basics of computer science: Databases, fundamentals of programming, operative systems, requirements engineering, agile and classical methodologies among many other things. I developed a few web applications projects with Java EE, Laravel (PHP) and specially with React, Express, MongoDB and Firebase.
